summary: A khajiit companion; No DLC required
descriptionHtml:
NO DLC REQUIRED!!!!

Sollek is pure warrior;

Archery, light weapons, heavy weapons and block are his biggest strengths

Sneak, light armor and heavy armor are his lesser attributes

Combat style is very high offense.

Perks: Critical Shot, Savage Strike, Devastating Blow, Elemental Protection, Deadly Bash, Silence, Unhindered, Conditioning.
__________________________________________________

He is fairly powerful, but balanced. I play with many difficulty mods so this build is reflective of that; he is neither a pushover nor is he an unstoppable god of war.

Set as essential, can be turned off in the console command if you wish.

Max level = 81

He is found eating, drinking, or cooking in The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

__________________________________________________
INSTALLATION

Simply drag the contents of this folder into your Skyrim Data folder.

'Course, you probably already knew that :)

__________________________________________________

Thanks, and treat him well!
or Shout him off the Throat of the World, that works too.
author: DaveEscape
